abstract: Security forces surround house of opposition politician Moise Katumbi after he announces his candidacy for president of war-torn Democratic Republic of Congo; popular and controversial former provincial governor accuses Pres Joseph Kabila, who has not indicated he will step down despite term limits, of intimidation.
lead_paragraph: Tensions intensified in the Democratic Republic of Congo after Moise Katumbi, an outspoken opposition figure, announced his bid to succeed Joseph Kabila, the president since 2001.

headline.main: Home of Congo Presidential Challenger Is Surrounded by Police
headline.print_headline: Home of Presidential Candidate in Congo Is Surrounded by the Police

snippet: Tensions intensified in the Democratic Republic of Congo after Moise Katumbi, an outspoken opposition figure, announced his bid to succeed Joseph Kabila, the president since 2001.
